layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x127
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x127
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x96
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 244x19
          text run at (0,0) width 244: "There should be a green square below:"
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (15,36) size 75x60 [bgcolor=#FF0000]
        LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 75x60 [color=#FFFFFF] [bgcolor=#FFFFFF]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 75x15
            text run at (0,0) width 75: "xx xx"
          LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 30x30 [color=#008000] [bgcolor=#FF0000]
            LayoutText {#text} at (0,15) size 30x30
              text run at (0,15) width 30: "xx"
              text run at (0,30) width 30: "xx"
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,45) size 75x15
            text run at (0,45) width 75: "xx xx"
